node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `writeup` ( `writeup_id` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `parent_e2node` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `wrtype_writeuptype` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `notnew` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `cooled` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `publishtime` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `feedback_policy_id` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`writeup_id`), KEY `parent_e2node_index` (`parent_e2node`), KEY `idx_cooled` (`cooled`), KEY `writeuptype` (`wrtype_writeuptype`), KEY `publishtime_index` (`publishtime`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 PACK_KEYS=1
node.title: writeup
